author: Victor Davis Hanson
title: Victor Davis Hanson: Trump can defeat coronavirus, save economy and turn disaster into an American victory
description: If President Trump panics and keeps the country locked down for too long, we will enter a depression that will cost more lives than the virus. But if Trump prematurely declares victory and urges Americans to rush back to normal life, he may reboot the virus a…
content:

The ancient Greeks believed that true leadership in crisis came down to what they called pronoia — the Greek word for “strategic foresight.”
